name: IRWIN 37-1
notes:
With many successful racing boats to his credit, Ted Irwin, promoted the IRWIN 37 as a no compromise cruising boat. 
Introduced in 1971, the IRWIN 37 was one of this builders most successful models though undergoing numerous changes until production ended in 1982. It's been said that nearly nearly 600 were sold.
Available as sloop, cutter or ketch. 
KEEL OPTIONS:
Shoal draft fixed keel: 4.92'
